verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wash us and cleanse us, O Holy One,
Keep us, anoint us, till Thy work is done.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Search us and know us, O Holy One,
Clothe us, adorn us, with seeds You have sown.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lead us and guide us unto Thy throne,
Choose us to enter in, even alone.
